pgrid.network.protocol
Interface PGridMessage

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Message
All Known Implementing Classes:
ACKMessage, BootstrapMessage, BootstrapReplyMessage, ChallengeMessage, ChallengeReplyMessage, ExchangeCSVIndexEntriesMessage, ExchangeIndexEntriesMessage, ExchangeInvitationMessage, ExchangeMessage, ExchangeReplyMessage, FidgetExchangeMessage, FidgetExchangeReplyMessage, GenericMessage, GetFile, GetFileReply, IndexModifierCSVMessage, IndexModifierMessage, InitMessage, InitResponseMessage, MaintenanceMessage, MessageHeader, NaFTConnectionRegisterMessage, NaFTConnectionRegisterReplyMessage, NaFTConnectionReversalInitMessage, NaFTConnectionReversalInitReplyMessage, PeerLookupMessage, PeerLookupReplyMessage, PGridCompressedMessage, PGridMessageImp, QueryMessage, QueryReplyMessage, RangeQueryMessage, ReplicateMessage, RouterACKMessage, SearchPathMessage, SearchPathReplyMessage
public interface PGridMessage
extends Message, Cloneable

This class represents a interface for all Gridella messages.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt
